name: THE MIRRAM GROUP LLC (ON BEHALF OF OPEN SOCIETY FOUNDATION)
sampleDescriptions: Puerto Rico's NAP program. Ongoing recovery and reconstruction efforts in Puerto Rico in the  aftermath of hurricanes Irma and Maria. Jones Act exemption, SNAP, EITC, CTC and other programs. GILTI tax
